snippet.title: Danganronpa Mauve | Chapter 1 Pt1 (Eng Sub)
snippet.description:
THERE'S A POLL GOING, IMPORTANT DECISION! :https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1kFPyJ5cVZWPiA8Fj2IF6-R4mAimTTrVUqqRhh5z9tz4/edit
We are finally starting our adventure with Mauve's story. There will be lots of twists and turns. And I'm deeply excited to finish this chapter as soon as possible. I hope you guys enjoy it too and big regards to Hero's team💜!!

Also shoutout to RainMaster for helping with the localization of Mauve's 💝
🤎The Ko-fi channel to support my work! :https://ko-fi.com/zephirum 
💜Our Chill Discord Server : https://discord.gg/vE9AMGAunS
